page.title: Database Sources
page.introduction: The Virtual Cell provides access to repositories of compatible biological models, internal and external. The internal VCell database repository stores the models created in the Virtual Cell in its native format. The external repositories are accessed through specific interfaces and allow users to search for models of interest and import selected models into a VCell MathModel or BioModel.
page.operations:
Model repositories accessible through VCell are located under the Database tabs in the lower left panel of any VCell document window:
VCell database (internal)
'BioModels Database' repository (external)
Pathway Commons repository (external)
For more information about the external model repositories visit their respective web sites:
'BioModels Database' (http://www.ebi.ac.uk/biomodels-main/)
Pathway Commons (http://www.pathwaycommons.org/pc/)
SabioRK (http://sabio.h-its.org/)
